source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Muvizu - Make Animations in Hours, not Months
items.headline: Beginner to Advanced guide to create fast but incredible and professional looking 3D animations with Muvizu
objectives_summary: How to create fast 3D animations with Muvizu - from the basics to professional use
How to create, edit and personalise your 3D character

items.title: Advance Maya Modeling
items.headline: learn must important tips and tricks to be a 3d modeler artist
objectives_summary: advance modeling technique in autodesk maya

items.title: Zaxwerks 3D ProAnimator Unleashed - Master 3D Fundamentals
items.headline: Unleash the power of 3D ProAnimator to Create 3D Text, Animations, 3d Logo and Hollywood looking Video Intros
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to make 3D Logo Intro for your videos
In this course, You will learn basic 3D Video & Animation techniques.
Learn how to use ProAnimator to create 3D Titles & Objects in your videos

items.title: Course Maya: Rigging with HumanIK.

visible_instructors.name: Andre

items.headline: Learn How to Rig with Maya and HumanIK.

items.title: Character Creation with ZBrush r7 and rendering in Keyshot 5
items.headline: Create stunning concepts and animation ready characters in ZBrush, 3D can enhance your current work flow and business.

items.title: The Complete AutoCAD Learning Package using AutoCAD 2021

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of $6m UK CAD Engineering Company
visible_instructors.title: Darren Fenton
visible_instructors.name: Darren

items.headline: Learn from a UK Expert running his own CAD company worldwide
objectives_summary: If you are a beginner, you will learn all the features of AutoCAD you need to design, draw and produce full drawings
If you already know AutoCAD, this course will give a great refresher and teach you things you didn't know
Complete various projects like floor plans, schematics, working drawings etc

items.title: Makers' Guide to Fusion 360
items.headline: By a Maker, For Makers of All Ages: Nail the Fundamentals, Internalize the Concepts, & Understand the Tools

items.title: Sculpt And Paint Your Own 3D Printable Halloween Pumpkin
items.headline: Halloween 3D modelling, sculpting in Zbrush, Learn how to make and paint your own models for 3D printing  or Rendering
objectives_summary: Creating A Halloween Pumpkin Model In Zbrush From Zero
Using The Basic Modelling, Sculpting Tools In Zbrush
Using The Color Painting Features In Zbrush

items.title: After Effects - Create Amazing Lower Thirds
items.headline: Motion Graphics & Lower Thirds

items.title: Creating a Cartoon Monster in Maya 2020
items.headline: Learn 3D modeling, Texturing, Lighting and Rendering in Maya and how to composite the final image in Photoshop
objectives_summary: How to learn Maya's modeling tools.
How to master professional modeling techniques.

items.title: Furniture Design by example I
items.headline: A step-by-step guide for modeling, mapping and rendering high quality Furniture.
objectives_summary: Understand the process of modeling a simple Furniture piece.
Unwrap your created 3D model with ease.

items.title: Zbrush Core Mini Tutorial: Learn Sculpting From Scratch
items.headline: By the end of the course you will be able to sculpt/model inside Zbrush Core Mini 2021 and ready for the main Zbrush.
objectives_summary: Zbrush Core Mini Tools and Options

items.title: Camtasia 2020: Create Epic Motion Graphics and Animations
items.headline: Custom Motion Graphics and Animations

items.title: SketchUp 2D to 3D - Spanish Architecture
items.headline: How to build a Spanish Style home using a 2D CAD plan, SketchUp and Lumion
objectives_summary: In this course students will learn how to quickly create a 3D sketchup model of a Spanish Architectural home. Our model will be built using SketchUp 2020. Student will also learn how to render this home in Lumion 10

items.title: Introduction to Rigging in Maya 2022
items.headline: This course is for those who wants to rig their characters and props but don't have any prior knowledge of Rigging.
